sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_nse_defaulted_broker"> <x_0586_nse_defaulted_broker action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <date_of_declaration>2020-02-13</date_of_declaration> <defaulter_members>VRISE SECURITIES PRIVATE LIMITED</defaulter_members> <directors_partners>RAKESH KIRIT KADAKIA SONAL RAKESH KADAKIA ANKIT HASMUKH CHHEDA</directors_partners> <number>DEF0001021</number> <reasons_for_declaring_the_member_as_defaulter>1) Non-availability of funds to meet client payables 2) Misuse of client funds and securities 3) Failure to co-operate with the Exchange in the conduct of the inspection 4) Failure to resolve investor complaints</reasons_for_declaring_the_member_as_defaulter> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-02-27 13:37:32</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3eb164bb2f71091051dad5f62799b663</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-02-27 13:37:32</sys_updated_on> </x_0586_nse_defaulted_broker> </record_update>
